demolition

Class BomberChar

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.GameObjects
      • demolition.BomberChar
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Player, RedEnemy, YellowEnemy

    public class BomberChar
extends GameObjects
    Represents the parent class of in-game character classes: Player, RedEnemy, YellowEnemy

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Tuple currLocation
      Intial location of the character.
      protected java.lang.String direction
      Direction which the character is facing.
      protected int FRAMES_PER_SPRITE
      Represents the number of frames each sprite of the character will be rendered.
      protected int GRID_SIZE
      Represents the size of one grid in pixels.
      protected int NUMBER_OF_SPRITE
      Represents the number of sprites in one cycle.
      protected int OFFSET
      Vertical offset value when drawing characters.
      protected double TIME_PER_SPRITE
      Represents the time each sprite shoud be rendered before moving to onto the next sprite of the cycle.
      protected int TOTAL_FRAMES
      Represents the total number of frames the character will be rendered in one cycle.

      • Fields inherited from class demolition.GameObjects

        FPS

      Returns the horizonal component of the character's current location in pixels.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BomberChar

        protected BomberChar(Tuple location)
        Constructor of parent class, requires intial location of the character on the grid. Character will face downwards intially.
        Parameters:
        location - Current location of the character.

    • Method Detail

      • pixelX

        Returns the horizonal component of the character's current location in pixels.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        value in pixels

      • pixelY

        protected int pixelY(int yCoord)

        Returns:

      • getCurrLocation

        protected Tuple getCurrLocation()
        Returns the coordinate pair of the character's current location. Only used for testing purposes.
        Returns:

      • move

        protected boolean move(java.lang.String moveDirection,
                       BomberMap map)
        Moves the character by 1 unit on the grid based on the given location. The character may only traverse through empty tiles. Upon reaching the goal tile, the Player has completed the level. Enemies can traverse though the goal tile normally;
        Parameters:
        moveDirection - Direction the character is moving towards.
        map - Map of the current level.
        Returns:
        if the character successfully moves
